channel.title: Add NPC's/Move NPC's on my server? and Lagg issue
channel.description:
Like the title said How do i NPC's people into my server and have them stay there and how do i move people already in my server from one spot to another?
How do i make my server less laggy? Ive heard someone talk about RAM? How do i check this and what would be a good level or amount?
My source is: "American rune's pk source"
If too confusing please leave a comment if not then still leave a comment on how to do this thanx!
thanks in advance!

item.title: Add NPC's/Move NPC's on my server? and Lagg issue
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

ok, there should be a file in Config Called Autospawn
here is how you spawn an npc
spawn = 233 2723 9805 0 2727 9809 2681 9801 1
Npc Id XCordY cord facing lowx high x low y high y and keep the 1 there

the last 4 are basically the box that you allow the npc to walkaround in
basically your listing the lowest x and the highest x cord

to make something like _ _

then the lowest and highest y

which forms the top - -
to make - -
|__|
in that horrible square, is the area the npc can walk around in.

about ram, ram is random access memory, which basically means, the more ram, the faster your computer is.
a way to find this on windows is system properties.

Read full topic
item.source: Add NPC's/Move NPC's on my server? and Lagg issue
